imageurl.title: Start
imageurl.description: Game start screen where the player begins the shape-matching challenge and enters the gameplay environment.

imageurl.title: Image Selected
imageurl.description: Gameplay screen where a shape is displayed and the player selects the matching shape from the given options.

imageurl.title: Game Completed
imageurl.description: Completion screen shown after successfully matching all shapes, displaying results, score, or success message.

imageurl.title: Reset
imageurl.description: Allows the player to restart the game and play the shape-matching challenge again from the beginning.

description: This product screenshot showcases a shape-matching game where players identify and match different shapes such as circles, squares, and more. The game is designed to improve visual recognition and cognitive skills through simple, interactive, and engaging gameplay.
